enemies.name: Wasp
enemies.description: A flying scout drone that patrols overhead, scanning for Raiders. Shoots once it locks on target.
tactics: Take out quickly before it alerts others
Use any weapon - even low-tier guns work
Prioritize if in groups to avoid swarms

enemies.name: Tick
enemies.description: A turret-like spider-bot that crawls on walls and ceilings, automatically firing at intruders. Spews poison on death.
tactics: Check ceilings and walls in buildings

enemies.name: Bastion
enemies.description: A large, slow-moving heavy walker equipped with devastating weapons. One of the toughest standard ARC machines.
enemies.loot: Rare materials, weapon blueprints, high-tier ammo

enemies.name: Queen
enemies.description: A hulking boss robot that guards harvesters stocked with high-tier weapon blueprints. Requires coordinated team effort.
tactics: Bring a full squad with coordinated loadouts
Focus on weak points when exposed
Maintain spread positions to avoid area attacks
enemies.loot: Legendary blueprints, rare materials, unique weapon mods

enemies.name: Hunter
enemies.description: Fast-moving ARC designed for rapid assault and harassment tactics.

enemies.name: Sentinel
enemies.description: Defensive ARC that deploys shields to protect itself and other machines.
tactics: Focus other enemies first if possible
Energy weapons can drain shields faster

generalTips: Always carry weapons with good ARC penetration for PvE
Prioritize scouts to avoid alerting entire areas
Heavy units require teamwork and high-penetration weapons
Listen for audio cues to detect nearby ARCs
Use environment for cover - ARCs have limited pathfinding
Bring healing items and shield rechargers for prolonged fights
Energy weapons excel against heavily armored targets
